    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Context>, java.util.Collection<Context>, java.util.List<Context>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class HdbAttribute
extends Strategy
    This class defines an attribute to be added to a subscriber It extends a Strategy to be stored or not in HDB

    verdier
